Hdyras:

Hydras has arrived at his base ans say to Lord Vykos by com 
link "Then we need other place to chat" said the male"The 
coordinates are 24-35 sector Leika... there we can chat with out any 
kind of problem... What time do you need to be there?"

Hydras was walkin towards a special are of his base...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Lord Vykos was not pleased of this Megatron's arrogance. He 
decided 
> to dismiss it for now though, but he kept this in mind.
> 
> Vykos: My presence in this system concerns you, and only you. This 
> means that your slaves have to be dismissed if you wish to hear 
it. 
> As for my reason talking to you, I think that the remaining 
Predacon 
> Lords should assist each other. Send me your coordinates, I will 
land 
> near your base.
> 
> He lifted a finger and Warghoul reluctantly pushed the ship 
forward 
> at slow speed. 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Hydras:
> > 
> > "I COMMAND YOU NOT TELL ME QUEEN!!!!!"boomed Hydras"I need that 
you 
> > remain here coveren and watch Maximal base... I want to leave a 
> > trusted soldier to plant a device when times comes"Hydras 
handled a 
> > strange disc device"Remember, just when I command you... while 
> > remain cover, Maximals won't bother you"
> >

> was

I'll

doing 
> in
